That sounds kind of dumb, but it happens all the time, outside of ntr situations where guys don't know how to handle certain emotions. Ultimately, if this was real life, this would end with the guy getting tired of it and either killing themself, or just straight up walking away. Welp, I hope to never see this doujin again

I personally wouldn't be content with my girl screwing another man still and would either break it off with her or dispose of the guy in legal ways, but in story wise, it seems like it might've become his kink, albeit not exactly willingly.
